Cognition Home Blog Get started with Devin 2.0 Devin 2.0 is now available Cognition An applied AI lab building the future of software engineering We’re the makers of Devin, a collaborative AI teammate that helps ambitious engineering teams achieve more. Get started with Devin Learn more about Devin ↗ Makers of Devin The world’s first AI software engineer, now available for all engineering teams. Get started today and read our announcement on X . Hire Devin Devin is now generally available. Start working with Devin today at app.devin.ai . Join us Our team is small and talent-dense. Our founding team has 10 IOI gold
        medals and includes leaders and builders who have worked at the cutting
        edge of applied AI at companies like Cursor, Scale AI, Lunchclub, Modal,
        Google DeepMind, Waymo, and Nuro.‍ Building Devin is just the first step—our hardest challenges still lie
        ahead. If you’re excited to solve some of the world’s biggest problems
        and build AI that can reason, learn more about our team and apply to one
        of the roles below. Open positions home blog Privacy policy Terms of service Enterprise terms of service Website terms DPA AUP Security
